problem_text:
Problem 73. Let Γ be a smooth codimension 2 surface in Rn. Must Γ intersect
some 2-dimensional plane in 5 points, if n is sufficiently large?
Comments. Obviously there is a more general problem here, where the codimen-
sion of Γ is d and one wants to know that some d-dimension plane intersects Γ in
f(n, d) points.
